data.text: @CovidComunidad @LongCovidSOS No meds, rest, prayer, God, created a belief system that I my body was resetting despite my situation. Make sure the right people are around you and learned to say no!
@carolannemanso2 @LongCovidSOS Rested (alot), prayed and made a mental decision to believe that I wasn't ill despite my situation and that my body was resetting itself!
@LereFisher @LongCovidSOS How brother? Did you do something special? Any med? Thanks 🙏🏽 and good for you âœ¨🤙🏽

@LereFisher @LongCovidSOS Im am so happy to see this Lere! 

 It's 2 years to the day that I first felt symptoms.  What a roller coaster of hell it's been but I've learned so much and come a long way. Not sure I'll ever be the same as pre covid again but I've got some quality of life back & so grateful
@LereFisher @LongCovidSOS I just passed 1 year in January. I have more good days now, with a new treatment, but still have a lot of days I spend mostly in bed.
@LereFisher @LongCovidSOS So many of us went down around that date. March 18th for me and finally seeing some improvement. Keep strong.
